Description.Name: Set Course: Bearing 270
Description.Details:
[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] knocks on your open doorway, "Commander {Commander.FIRSTNAME} {Commander.LASTNAME}, you have a moment to see me, quiaff?"

{SCN_MW.Det_C} use of clan dialect still confuses you to this day, "Yes, um, aff... Come in.  What's on your mind MechWarrior?"

[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] moves over to sit at the vacant chair in front of your desk, {SCN_MW.Det} larger than normal frame barely allowing {SCN_MW.Obj} to sit comfortably.  You can't help but think {TGT_MW.SUBJ}'d be more than capable in a suit of power armor even though {TGT_MW.SUBJ} is small by Elemental standards.  [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] interrupts your thoughts as {TGT_MW.SUBJ} looks you straight in the eye, "Commander {Commander.FIRSTNAME} {Commander.LASTNAME}, I formally request your permission to depart {COMPANY.CompanyName}."

His bluntness sets you back, "Excuse me?  Did you just say you are wanting out of {COMPANY.CompanyName}?"

"Aff, Commander {Commander.FIRSTNAME} {Commander.LASTNAME}," [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]].  "I have something I must do as Star Adder, and it cannot involve this company."

You exhale audibly, "Surely we can assist by getting you to your destination.  Where do we need to go?"

[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]shakes their head, "Neg, Commander {Commander.FIRSTNAME} {Commander.LASTNAME}.  Your offer is appreciated but this is only for the bloodnamed of Clan Star Adder.  If you give me permission to leave, I will contact you when I have completed my task and rejoin your company."

You can tell {SCN_MW.Subj} is not going to tell you much more, but you pry a bit anyways, “Care to elaborate?”

[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] replies, “I have unfinished business with my Clan.  Once my task is complete, I will return a changed man.  I aim to replace some of my skills with new ones, somewhat like the adder shedding its skin.  You will grant me the right to leave, quiaff?”

Description.Name: Stuck Bearing
Description.Details:
You look at [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], "I'm sorry, but I cannot afford to lose you right now.  You're a valued asset to {COMPANY.CompanyName} and we need you dropping into combat.
Let's discuss this in a few weeks or so ok?"

[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] stares at you for a long while before answering, "I have signed a contract with you, {COMMANDER.FirstName} {COMMANDER.LastName}, so I am honour bound to adhere to your decision.  I can wait for a bit, but time is of the essence for me.  You will not make me wait too long, quiaff?"

Description.Name: Bearing's Gone
Description.Details:
You look at [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], "I can see by your tone you really need to do this don't you?"

[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] nods, "Aff, {COMMANDER.FirstName} {COMMANDER.LastName}.  I honestly cannot say how long this will take but I will eventually contact you when I am ready to return."

As you stand, so too does [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], and you both clasp hands, "This is where I think I am supposed to say, 'Bargained Well and Done'."
